meta.description: Minimize the total delivery cost for visiting each city exactly once and returning to the starting city.

vars.name: x
vars.description: 1 if the route goes from city i to city j, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)

constraints.name: visit_Alpha
constraints.description: Leave Alpha exactly once

constraints.name: visit_Bravo
constraints.description: Leave Bravo exactly once

constraints.name: visit_Charlie
constraints.description: Leave Charlie exactly once

constraints.name: visit_Delta
constraints.description: Leave Delta exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_Alpha
constraints.description: Arrive at Alpha exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_Bravo
constraints.description: Arrive at Bravo exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_Charlie
constraints.description: Arrive at Charlie exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_Delta
constraints.description: Arrive at Delta exactly once

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Alpha
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Alpha to Bravo

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Alpha_Charlie
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Alpha to Charlie

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Alpha_Delta
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Alpha to Delta

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Bravo_Alpha
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Bravo to Alpha

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Bravo_Charlie
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Bravo to Charlie

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Bravo_Delta
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Bravo to Delta

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Charlie_Alpha
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Charlie to Alpha

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Charlie_Bravo
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Charlie to Bravo

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Charlie_Delta
constraints.description: Subtour elimination for Charlie to Delta

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_Delta_Alpha
